product.name: Window Visors Rain Guards for 2006-2013 Chevy Impala, Out-Channel Window Vent Wind Deflectors Visors Shades for 2014-2016 Impala Limited
product.description:
Here in YQAUTEC Store, we strive to provide all our customers the premium auto parts with high quality materials. We have a full line of window visors, bumpers, hoods, grilles, light assemblies and much more for your choice.
* Maximum protection against rain, wind, dust, dirt, and sun glare.
* Shields your eyes from the sun for safer driving.
* Fresh air circulation removes stale air and odors.
* Enhance the appearance of exterior of your vehicle.
* Reduces interior wind noise and prevent window from fogging.
* We strictly control the quality of our products.
* We love what we do.
* We are always here to provide you with the most sincere service.
product.bullet_points:
• 【Perfect Fit】YQAUTEC 4Pcs Out-channel Window Visors Rain Guards Shield fit for 2006 2007 2008 2009 2010 2011 2012 2013 06 07 08 09 10 11 12 13 Chevy Impala, Side Window Vent Wind Deflectors Visors Shades for 2014 2015 2016 14 15 16 Impala Limited.
• 【Premium Quality】Made from high-quality and durable anti-shatter material, these Rain Guards have great performance in UV & scratch resistance test. And those 3M-graded tape helps stick firmly.
• 【Fully Functional】You could enjoy the fresh air and keep the rain drops out after installing the vent visors and keeping the window cracked open, no foggy worries.
• 【Easy STICK-ON style】Outside Mount Style/ NOT In-channel. No drilling or special hardwares required. Test fit the visors first to make sure it's the right model before you tape them on.[NOTE: Don't wash your car 24 hours after installation.]
• 【Warranty& Support】1-YEAR WARRANTY. LIFETIME SUPPORT. If you have any questions, just let us know and we will reply ASAP.
